credit_line: Gift of Mrs Calvin W. Stillman
title: Textile
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: predominantly warp-faced plain weave patterned by supplementary weft floats
description: Large-scale geometric design in black on white, with bands of figures of triangles with three-pronged appendages separated by four black stripes. The binding system created black vertical lines in the white areas and white horizontal lines in the black areas, for a tonal effect.
name: Textile
